name: reversible-map
description: A reversible map using classic JS Map

scripts.publish-patch: tsc && tsc -d && git commit -am 'Patch publish' && npm version patch && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: tsc && tsc -d && git commit -am 'Minor publish' && npm version minor && npm publish
scripts.publish-major: tsc && tsc -d && git commit -am 'Major publish' && npm version major && npm publish
